column4: Kan anyone tell me hot to put my network card in Promiscuos mode and back again?
that's outlined in the ifconfig docs. try "man ifconfig"
In terminal
yes
thanks :) Is it possible for for an example make a new interface in monitor mode and then switch to that when I need it?
you can have a config file to load if you want, but I don't know how to do it\. or have 2 devices. are you on a switched lan?
What do you mean? I'm on Wlan
oh, you want to snoop?
yeah, try a different config file, and you can load it when you need it
What do you mean by snoop? I'm testing my own wireless..
Any documentation on that? :)
whether legal or not, it's it's snooping. I'm sure there is. have you been through all of the ifconfig man pages, the info pages and googled what you want to do?
you want to pull packets from some other connection, correct?
No not yet, as I'm not certain what exactly what I'm looking for:) But Yes I want to snoop my own network.
check out ethereal
Yes that's what I want :)
Thanks :)
no problem. have fun!!
Thanks :) Other things I should look at?
wireshark is a good program, and you could also do a google/linux search for wep cracking if you'd like to see why you shouldn't use it
I have that ;) (Not WEP crack though) but any documentation of sorts?
I would suggest browsing tldp.org because it's all there in one place with a lot of how-to docs
Thanks a lot :) Have a good night :)
you too
